trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded"></xref> event, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted"></xref> event, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed"></xref> event, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved"></xref> event, or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que manipulará o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded"> </xref> evento, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted"> </xref> evento, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed"> </xref> evento, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved"> </xref> evento, ou <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The method specified in the WebPartEventHandler delegate will be called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded> event, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted> event, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed> event, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> event, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: O método especificado no delegado WebPartEventHandler será chamado quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>evento, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted>evento, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed>evento <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved>evento, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged>é gerado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartMoved> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartClosed> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartDeleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartAdded>

trans-unit.source: Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Parts events by adding an `OnWebPartAdded` attribute, `OnWebPartDeleted` attribute, `OnWebPartClosed` attribute, `OnWebPartMoved` attribute, or `OnSelectedWebPartChanged` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.
trans-unit.target: Os desenvolvedores de páginas podem fornecer manipuladores personalizados para eventos de Web Parts adicionando um `OnWebPartAdded` atributo, `OnWebPartDeleted` atributo, `OnWebPartClosed` atributo, `OnWebPartMoved` atributo, ou `OnSelectedWebPartChanged` de atributo para o `<asp:webpartmanager>` elemento em uma página e atribuir um nome de método personalizado para o atributo.

trans-unit.source: A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador personalizado também pode ser atribuído programaticamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como atribuir programaticamente um manipulador de eventos, consulte [NIB: como: conectar-se métodos do manipulador de eventos para eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
